name: COVID-19 (WarreDev)
description:
Protect yourself and your grandma from the swarming virus!

USE ‘e’ or ‘LeftClick’ to shoot antibacterial spray at the virus’. ‘a’ & ‘d’ to move left and right.

This project was for the Ludum Dare 46 Theme: Keep it alive game jam.

Ps. We forgot the start date and only started on the 20th April. lol.
Thanks for playing.

Alex Warren, Henry Mead, Nick Gosbee & Jack Hiskett.
